titles.title: To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate segments of the Molalla River in the State of Oregon as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.
Molalla River Wild and Scenic Rivers Act
Molalla River Wild and Scenic Rivers Act
Molalla River Wild and Scenic Rivers Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Molalla River Wild and Scenic Rivers Act
This bill designates specified segments of the Molalla River in Oregon as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
